select tpi.*, tami.status audit_status, tami.create_time audit_time from tb_project_info tpi left join tb_audit_manage_info tami on tpi.id = tami.source_id
tpi.deleted = 0 and tami.status = 1
and project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.projectName},'%')
and tpi.status in
#{item}
and tpi.status != 4
and area_code LIKE CONCAT(#{params.areaCode},'%')
and tpi.id in (select project_id from tb_project_label_relation where label_id in
#{item}
GROUP BY project_id)
ORDER BY sort_num asc , create_time DESC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%c' ) `name`, COUNT( id ) `value` FROM tb_project_info WHERE status IN ( 0, 1, 2 ) and create_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY `name`
SELECT area_name `name`, COUNT( id ) `value` FROM tb_project_info WHERE `status` IN ( 0, 1, 2 ) and area_name is not null GROUP BY area_code ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT a.name,IFNULL(b.value ,0) value FROM ( SELECT '0-50亩' AS `name` UNION SELECT '50-100亩' AS `name` UNION SELECT '100-300亩' AS `name` UNION SELECT '300-500亩' AS `name` UNION SELECT '500亩以上' AS `name` ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT name,COUNT(1) `value` FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN project_plan_footprint > 0 and project_plan_footprint <= 50 THEN '0-50亩' WHEN project_plan_footprint > 50 and project_plan_footprint <= 100 THEN '50-100亩' WHEN project_plan_footprint > 100 and project_plan_footprint <= 300 THEN '100-300亩' WHEN project_plan_footprint > 300 and project_plan_footprint <= 500 THEN '300-500亩' WHEN project_plan_footprint > 500 THEN '500亩以上' END `name` FROM tb_project_info WHERE project_plan_footprint IS NOT NULL and status in (0,1,2) )t GROUP BY name) b ON a.name = b.name

SELECT a.name,IFNULL(b.value,0) value, IFNULL(b.money,0) * 10000 as money, ifnull(convert(b.money/(select sum(investment_total) from tb_project_info WHERE investment_total IS NOT NULL), decimal(10,2)) * 100, 0) as scale FROM ( SELECT '百万级别' AS `name` UNION SELECT '千万级别' AS `name` UNION SELECT '亿级' AS `name` UNION SELECT '十亿级' AS `name` UNION SELECT '十亿级以上' AS `name` ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT name,COUNT(name) `value`, CONVERT(sum(t.investment_total), DECIMAL(10,2)) money FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN investment_total >= 0.01 and investment_total < 0.1 THEN '百万级别' WHEN investment_total >= 0.1 and investment_total < 1 THEN '千万级别' WHEN investment_total >= 1 and investment_total < 10 THEN '亿级' WHEN investment_total >= 10 and investment_total < 100 THEN '十亿级' WHEN investment_total >= 100 THEN '十亿级以上' END `name`, investment_total FROM tb_project_info WHERE investment_total IS NOT NULL and deleted=0 )t GROUP BY name) b ON a.name = b.name

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%c' ) `name`, IFNULL(sum( investment_total ),0) investmentTotal, IFNULL(sum( funding_amount ),0) fundingAmount FROM tb_project_info WHERE `status` = 2 and create_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY `name`
SELECT id FROM tb_project_info WHERE deleted = 0 and company_id = #{companyId}

select sum(investment_total) * 10000 from tb_project_info
investment_total IS NOT NULL and deleted=0
and #{params.beginTime} <= create_time
and #{params.endTime} >= create_time

select '注册公司' as name, count(id) as value from tb_register_info where blacklist = false and audit_status = 1 and company_info_finish_sign = 1 union all select '投资项目' as name, count(id) as value from tb_project_info where deleted = 0 union all select '规划项目占地' as name, Convert(sum(project_plan_footprint), DECIMAL(10,0)) as value from tb_project_info where deleted = 0

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dateInfo.mark,'%m/%d') AS name, COALESCE (dataInfo.num,0) AS value FROM (SELECT date_add(date_sub(#{params.beginDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL (CAST(help_topic_id AS signed) + 1) DAY) AS mark FROM mysql.help_topic WHERE help_topic_id < DATEDIFF(#{params.endDate}, DATE_SUB(#{params.beginDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY))) AS dateInfo LEFT JOIN (SELECT LEFT(create_time,10) as mark, COUNT(id) AS num FROM tb_project_info WHERE deleted = 0 GROUP BY LEFT(create_time,10)) as dataInfo ON dateInfo.mark = dataInfo.mark ORDER BY dateInfo.mark

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dateInfo.mark,'%m/%d') AS name, COALESCE (dataInfo.num,0) AS value FROM (SELECT date_add(date_sub(#{params.beginDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL (CAST(help_topic_id AS signed) + 1) DAY) AS mark FROM mysql.help_topic WHERE help_topic_id < DATEDIFF(#{params.endDate}, DATE_SUB(#{params.beginDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY))) AS dateInfo LEFT JOIN (SELECT LEFT(update_time,10) as mark, view_num AS num FROM tb_project_info WHERE deleted = 0 and id = #{params.projectId} GROUP BY LEFT(update_time,10)) as dataInfo ON dateInfo.mark = dataInfo.mark ORDER BY dateInfo.mark

tpi.deleted = 0
and area_code like concat(#{areaCode}, '%')
